rules_text:
Whenever one or more artifacts you control enter, Vedalken Powermonger experiments. [i](Exile the top card of your library. You may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If you don't, you may play the exiled card this turn.)[/i]
Exile three cards from your graveyard: Create a Cell token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
